head.title: Eureka! A Key to the Code of Life

hedline.hl1: Eureka! A Key to the Code of Life

abstract.p: Marcus Mommsen letter on June 27 article questions euphoria about costly human genome project; drawing

block.p: Why the euphoria about the genome project (front page, June 27)? Its findings are supposed to cure incurable diseases, save lives and improve the quality of life. These goals are years and billions of dollars away. While the years pass and the billions disappear, millions of children will starve to death. Millions more children will suffer and die of diseases that we can cure for a few dollars right now.
